breedingchains-desc: [[Special:BreedingChains|Displays]] the possible breeding chains of a given Pokémon, move and gen.
breedingchains-error: Oh no :O, this should not have happened. Please report this on our Discord server or [[PokéWiki:Auskunft|here]]. Error: $1
breedingchains-can-learn-directly-old-ge: $1 can learn the move $2 directly via level up, TMHM or a move tutor
breedingchains-can-learn-directly-new-ge: $1 can learn the move $2 directly via level up, TMTR or a move tutor.
breedingchains-can-learn-event: $1 can have the move $2 in an event distribution.
breedingchains-can-learn-oldgen: $1 can learn the move $2 in an old game generation.
breedingchains-can-inherit-but-no-succes: $1 could inherit the move $1, but it has no suitable breeding parents.
breedingchains-invalid-pkmn: Invalid character in the Pokémon name. You probably made a typo somewhere.
breedingchains-invalid-move: Invalid character in the move name. You probably made a typo somewhere.
breedingchains-invalid-gen: Invalid input for the game generation. Please just use the selection and don't play around in the URL ;)
breedingchains-markerexplanation-oldgen: If Mewtu could learn the move only in an '''old generation''', it would look like this.
breedingchains-markerexplanation-event: If Mewtu could have the move only from an '''event distribution''', it would look like this.
breedingchains-markerexplanation-bottomn: The markers do '''not''' exclude an additional learnability via breeding.
breedingchains-easteregg-greenchu: Das Phänomen Greenchu ist noch weitgehend unerforscht. Dementsprechend wissen wir nicht, ob es $1 überhaupt erlernen kann. Selbst in der Entstehungsgeschichte bestehen noch große Lücken. Falls du dort etwas weißt, teile es uns bitte mit :D
breedingchains-easteregg-dexter: ... Ob ich $1 erlernen kann? Ich bin vielleicht angehender professioneller Druckerreparierer, Teilzeit-Mod und Discord-Hobbypsychologe, aber ich bin (leider oder zum Glück) kein Pokémon!
breedingchains-unknown-move: The move $1 is unknown to me. You probably made a typo somewhere.
breedingchains-unknown-game: The game $1 is unknown to me or I don't support it. Please use the dropdown of the text input box (in some browsers you need to double click on the text box). Keep in mind that only those suggestions that suit the currently written text are shown.
